herbivores.name: Elk
herbivores.description: Majestic creatures with large antlers, grazing on lush vegetation, providing a source of meat and fur.

herbivores.name: White Stags
herbivores.description: Rare, ethereal stags with glowing antlers, symbolic of the Dryads’ magic, roaming freely in the deeper parts of the forest.

herbivores.name: Moonlit Deer
herbivores.description: Smaller, silvery-coated deer with a faint glow, feeding on enchanted grasses that grow around magical springs.

herbivores.name: Glimmer Rabbits
herbivores.description: Fast-breeding rabbits with shimmering fur, good for both their meat and pelts.

herbivores.name: Woodland Hares
herbivores.description: Larger, strong-legged hares, known for being swift and elusive, feeding on forest shrubs and roots.

herbivores.name: Forest Boars
herbivores.description: Robust, tusked boars, thriving in the underbrush, providing both meat and hides.

herbivores.name: Treecap Capybaras
herbivores.description: Large, semi-aquatic herbivores that live near rivers and ponds, grazing on water plants and forest herbs.

herbivores.name: Silverhorn Goats
herbivores.description: Agile goats with silver-tinted horns, dwelling in rocky areas, eating grasses and mosses.

carnivores.name: Shadow Lynxes
carnivores.description: Stealthy, magical felines with coats that shift with the light, blending into the shadows of the forest.

carnivores.name: Nightshade Wolves
carnivores.description: Packs of sleek, dark-furred wolves with glowing eyes, hunting in the cover of darkness, balancing the herbivore population.

carnivores.name: Mist Panthers
carnivores.description: Solitary, ethereal panthers that appear and disappear with the mist, keeping smaller prey populations under control.

carnivores.name: Glade Bears
carnivores.description: Large, lumbering bears with thick fur, eating both meat and berries, revered by the fae for their strength.

carnivores.name: Owl Griffons
carnivores.description: Hybrid creatures with the body of a large feline and the wings of an owl, hunting small animals and intruders.

birds.name: Celestial Owls
birds.description: Large owls with starry feathers, capable of seeing in pitch-black darkness, often used by fae as messengers or companions.

birds.name: Moon Hawks
birds.description: Silent predators with gleaming feathers under moonlight, hunting small prey like mice and rabbits.

birds.name: Silver Ravens
birds.description: Intelligent birds known to mimic speech, gathering shiny objects and watching over the forest.

birds.name: Willowfinches
birds.description: Small, brightly colored songbirds that thrive in magical trees, bringing life and music to the forest.

birds.name: Shadow Falcons
birds.description: Swift, predatory birds with dark plumage, darting between trees, hunting smaller birds and mammals.

reptiles_and_amphibians.name: Mossback Turtles
reptiles_and_amphibians.description: Large turtles with moss-covered shells, blending into the forest floor, feeding on aquatic plants and insects.

reptiles_and_amphibians.name: Wraithwood Serpents
reptiles_and_amphibians.description: Slender, green and black serpents moving silently through the undergrowth, keeping rodent populations in check.

reptiles_and_amphibians.name: Silver Frogs
reptiles_and_amphibians.description: Small, shimmering frogs found near enchanted ponds and streams, with healing properties.

reptiles_and_amphibians.name: Forest Drakes
reptiles_and_amphibians.description: Small, wingless dragon-like creatures, feeding on small animals, mushrooms, and enchanted plants.

reptiles_and_amphibians.name: Iridescent Salamanders
reptiles_and_amphibians.description: Amphibians that glow faintly under moonlight, thriving in the humid, damp parts of Wraithwood, with healing properties.

insects_and_small_creatures.name: Lumin Moths
insects_and_small_creatures.description: Large, glowing moths drawn to magical energies, lighting the paths for wandering fae.

insects_and_small_creatures.name: Fireflies
insects_and_small_creatures.description: Abundant throughout the forest, their soft glow illuminates the night, enhancing the magical atmosphere.

insects_and_small_creatures.name: Enchanted Butterflies
insects_and_small_creatures.description: Colorful butterflies with shimmering wings, pollinating the magical plants of Wraithwood.

insects_and_small_creatures.name: Glow Beetles
insects_and_small_creatures.description: Small beetles with luminous bodies, living in trees and feeding on enchanted tree sap.

insects_and_small_creatures.name: Sapphire Dragonflies
insects_and_small_creatures.description: Elegant dragonflies with shimmering blue wings, darting around lakes and ponds, keeping the mosquito population in check.

magical_beasts.name: Sylvan Unicorns
magical_beasts.description: Mystical creatures with pearlescent coats and spiraled horns, living deep in the forest, symbolizing purity.

magical_beasts.name: Eldertree Ents
magical_beasts.description: Ancient, sentient tree-like beings acting as protectors of the oldest parts of the Wraithwood.

magical_beasts.name: Wisp Foxes
magical_beasts.description: Small, fox-like creatures flickering in and out of existence, leaving trails of glowing light.

magical_beasts.name: Grove Griffins
magical_beasts.description: Winged creatures, part eagle and part lion, fiercely protective of the Dryads and sacred groves.

magical_beasts.name: Phantom Stags
magical_beasts.description: Ethereal, ghost-like stags appearing only on full moons, guiding or misleading travelers.

aquatic_fauna.name: Moonlit Koi
aquatic_fauna.description: Enchanted fish with shimmering scales that reflect moonlight, illuminating the lake at night. These koi glow brightest during full moons.
aquatic_fauna.role: Symbolic of balance and harmony, representing the healing process of the land and water.

aquatic_fauna.name: Mossback Turtles
aquatic_fauna.description: Large turtles with moss-covered shells, blending perfectly with the lake environment.
aquatic_fauna.role: Their shells provide habitats for aquatic plants, promoting ecosystem growth.

aquatic_fauna.name: Lakeshadow Eels
aquatic_fauna.description: Serpentine eels with translucent bodies that glow faintly in blue and green, mimicking the movement of magical currents.
aquatic_fauna.role: Enhance mana flow in the lake, amplifying its restorative powers.

aquatic_fauna.name: Azure Cranes
aquatic_fauna.description: Graceful birds with feathers sparkling like sapphire gemstones, often seen feeding along the water’s edge.
aquatic_fauna.role: Messengers of the gods, bringing blessings to those they encounter.

aquatic_fauna.name: Willowfinches
aquatic_fauna.description: Small, brightly colored songbirds seen resting on enchanted trees by the lake.
aquatic_fauna.role: Their melodies enhance the magic-infused atmosphere of the area.

aquatic_fauna.name: Mist Serpents
aquatic_fauna.description: Serpentine creatures that weave through lake mist, leaving shimmering trails.
aquatic_fauna.role: Keepers of the lake’s magic, revered as symbols of wisdom and fluidity.

flora.name: Glowlilies
flora.description: Lilies that bloom only under moonlight, emitting a soft, phosphorescent glow.

flora.name: Mana Reeds
flora.description: Tall reeds that hum faintly when touched by wind, enhancing magical energies.

flora.name: Dreaming Lotus
flora.description: An aquatic flower whose petals change colors based on the emotional energy in the area.

aquatic_fauna.name: Frostscale Trout
aquatic_fauna.description: Fish with shimmering, icy-blue scales, adapted to thrive in the lake’s frigid waters. They move slowly but gracefully, resembling shards of ice drifting through the water.
aquatic_fauna.role: Symbolic of endurance and adaptation, their presence ensures the balance of the cold aquatic ecosystem.

aquatic_fauna.name: Glacier Otters
aquatic_fauna.description: Snow-white otters with fur that feels cold to the touch. They build dens beneath frozen overhangs and are known to hoard enchanted objects they find along the shore.
aquatic_fauna.role: Keepers of hidden treasures, their presence indicates areas rich with magic beneath the ice.

aquatic_fauna.name: Frostbite Eels
aquatic_fauna.description: Long, sleek eels with translucent bodies that emit a chilling aura. They lurk in the deepest parts of the lake, stunning prey with their frost-coated skin.
aquatic_fauna.role: Control the population of smaller creatures, keeping the ecosystem balanced.

aquatic_fauna.name: Crystal Swans
aquatic_fauna.description: Elegant birds with feathers resembling delicate ice crystals. Their mournful songs echo over the lake during twilight.
aquatic_fauna.role: Symbolize lost love and memory, their presence is believed to attract spirits seeking peace.

aquatic_fauna.name: Snowhorn Walruses
aquatic_fauna.description: Massive, tusked creatures with thick fur and magical resistance. They congregate on ice floes, defending their territory fiercely.
aquatic_fauna.role: Guardians of the lake’s frozen waters, deterring intruders with their strength.

aquatic_fauna.name: Shadow-Piercing Storks
aquatic_fauna.description: Tall birds with dark plumage and glowing blue eyes. They feed on small fish by darting through the lake’s shadows.
aquatic_fauna.role: Bridge the realms of shadow and water, believed to have the power to glimpse into hidden dimensions.

flora.name: Frostbloom Lilies
flora.description: Rare flowers that bloom beneath the ice, their petals glowing with soft white light. They are visible only during the night and radiate a faint, magical warmth.

flora.name: Icewillow Reeds
flora.description: Slender reeds that sway despite the still air, emitting a faint whispering sound. Legends say these reeds are inhabited by spirits bound to the lake.

flora.name: Mirror Lotus
flora.description: This aquatic flower forms just beneath the ice, reflecting not only the sky above but visions of alternate futures and hidden truths.
